faqData.question: üèçÔ∏è What should I check before buying a used bike?
faqData.answer: Always check the service history, RC book, insurance, chassis number, and test the bike's overall condition.

faqData.question: üèçÔ∏è How do I know if a used bike is accident-free?
faqData.answer: Inspect the chassis and frame for welding or damage, or get it inspected by our experts.

faqData.question: üèçÔ∏è Can I get a loan to buy a used bike?
faqData.answer: Yes, we offer easy financing options with low-interest EMIs for eligible customers.

faqData.question: üèçÔ∏è Is test ride available before purchasing?
faqData.answer: Yes, you can test ride the bike at our hub or request a home test ride (based on availability).

faqData.question: üèçÔ∏è How is RC transfer handled?
faqData.answer: We take care of complete RC transfer and ensure it‚Äôs done safely and legally.

faqData.question: üèçÔ∏è What documents do I need to buy a used bike?
faqData.answer: You'll need an ID proof, address proof, and a passport-size photo.

faqData.question: üèçÔ∏è How do I sell my bike through WheelsForDeals?
faqData.answer: Submit your bike details, and we‚Äôll contact you for inspection and price estimation.

faqData.question: üèçÔ∏è How do you decide the price of my bike?
faqData.answer: Pricing is based on your bike‚Äôs condition, model, year, kilometers run, and current market rates.

faqData.question: üèçÔ∏è How long does it take to get payment after selling?
faqData.answer: Once the deal is confirmed and paperwork is completed, payment is done on the same day.

faqData.question: üèçÔ∏è Who will handle the paperwork and RC transfer after I sell?
faqData.answer: We handle the full RC transfer and ownership change to ensure a smooth experience for you.

question_answer.question: What should I check before buying a used bike?
question_answer.answer: Always check the service history, RC book, insurance, chassis number, and test the bike's overall condition.

question_answer.question: Is test ride available before purchasing?
question_answer.answer: Yes, you can test ride the bike at our hub or request a home test ride (based on availability).

question_answer.question: Can I get a loan to buy a used bike?
question_answer.answer: Yes, we offer easy financing options with low-interest EMIs for eligible customers.

question_answer.question: Do bikes come with active insurance?
question_answer.answer: Most bikes come with valid insurance. We also assist with new policies if required.

question_answer.question: Are all bikes inspected before listing?
question_answer.answer: Yes, each bike undergoes a thorough inspection before being listed on our platform.

question_answer.question: Do I get a warranty with my bike?
question_answer.answer: Yes, we provide a limited warranty for certain models. Check with our team for more details.

question_answer.question: Can I reserve a bike before visiting?
question_answer.answer: Yes, you can reserve a bike for up to 24 hours through our online portal.

question_answer.question: What documents do I need to purchase a bike?
question_answer.answer: You need ID proof, address proof, and a passport-size photograph.

question_answer.question: Is there any return policy?
question_answer.answer: Yes, you can return the bike within 3 days if there is a major issue not disclosed earlier.

question_answer.question: How is the RC transferred to my name?
question_answer.answer: We handle the complete RC transfer process for a hassle-free experience.

question_answer.question: How do I sell my bike through WheelsForDeals?
question_answer.answer: Submit your bike details, and we‚Äôll contact you for inspection and price estimation.

question_answer.question: How long does it take to get payment after selling?
question_answer.answer: Once the deal is confirmed and paperwork is completed, payment is done on the same day.

question_answer.question: Do I need to bring the bike to your center?
question_answer.answer: We offer both in-hub and doorstep evaluation options for your convenience.

question_answer.question: How is the value of my bike calculated?
question_answer.answer: We evaluate based on age, brand, model, mileage, condition, and current market demand.

question_answer.question: Who handles the RC and ownership transfer?
question_answer.answer: We manage the full paperwork and legal transfer on your behalf.

question_answer.question: Is there a service charge to sell my bike?
question_answer.answer: We charge a minimal service fee, which is deducted from the final sale amount.

question_answer.question: Can I sell a bike that is still under finance?
question_answer.answer: Yes, but you must clear the pending dues or provide an NOC from your financer.

question_answer.question: Do I need to service my bike before selling?
question_answer.answer: It's not mandatory, but a well-maintained bike typically fetches a better price.

question_answer.question: What documents are required to sell my bike?
question_answer.answer: You'll need the RC book, valid insurance, ID proof, and two passport-size photos.

question_answer.question: Will I get a confirmation of sale?
question_answer.answer: Yes, you'll receive a formal sale confirmation and receipt after deal completion.

heading.text: Need help choosing or selling a bike?

paragraph.text: We simplify the process with inspection, financing, and paperwork. Reach out to our expert team anytime.

Booking an Appointment.question: I cannot find my car‚Äôs registration state while booking the appointment online.
Booking an Appointment.answer: This may just happen because we are not currently present in your state. However, we are expanding at a rapid pace and plan to launch the used car buying service in many more cities pan India, very soon.

Booking an Appointment.question: Does CARS24 provide home inspection?
Booking an Appointment.answer: Yes, CARS24 is currently offering Car Inspection at Home for a hassle-free selling experience.

Booking an Appointment.question: Can I reschedule my appointment?
Booking an Appointment.answer: Yes, you can change your appointment time, date or branch by logging in with your mobile number.

Branch Visit.question: Where are your branches located?
Branch Visit.answer: You can find our branches using the locator on our site.

Branch Visit.question: Can I walk in without an appointment?
Branch Visit.answer: Yes, but appointments are preferred to save time.

Branch Visit.question: What documents should I carry?
Branch Visit.answer: RC book, ID proof, and insurance copy are required.

CARS24 Best Price.question: How is the best price calculated?
CARS24 Best Price.answer: Based on inspection, market data, and demand.

CARS24 Best Price.question: Is the quoted price negotiable?
CARS24 Best Price.answer: Yes, we offer a transparent price but minor negotiations are possible.

CARS24 Best Price.question: Do you match competitor offers?
CARS24 Best Price.answer: We strive to offer the best rate. You can share other quotes.

CARS24 Seller Protection Policy.question: What is the seller protection policy?
CARS24 Seller Protection Policy.answer: It ensures safe transactions and document verification.

CARS24 Seller Protection Policy.question: Am I liable after selling?
CARS24 Seller Protection Policy.answer: No, liability transfers post ownership change.

CARS24 Seller Protection Policy.question: What does the policy cover?
CARS24 Seller Protection Policy.answer: Covers document handling, RC transfer, and fraud protection.

Post-Sales Service.question: What happens after I sell my car?
Post-Sales Service.answer: We handle ownership transfer and payment.

Post-Sales Service.question: How long for payment after sale?
How do I get proof of sale?
Post-Sales Service.answer: We email and upload it in your dashboard.

Transaction Guidelines.question: What are your transaction policies?
Transaction Guidelines.answer: We follow verified payment and RC transfer practices.

Transaction Guidelines.question: Do you charge extra fees?
Transaction Guidelines.answer: No hidden charges. Final quote includes everything.

Transaction Guidelines.question: Is payment instant?
Transaction Guidelines.answer: Mostly within hours of final confirmation.

Pricing and Documentation.question: Do I need insurance?
Pricing and Documentation.answer: Yes, even expired insurance is acceptable during valuation.

Pricing and Documentation.question: Is NOC required?
Pricing and Documentation.answer: Yes, for interstate or loan closure sales.

Pricing and Documentation.question: What affects my car‚Äôs price?
Pricing and Documentation.answer: Model, mileage, condition, service history etc.

Home Inspection.question: How to book a home inspection?
Home Inspection.answer: Select your city and choose home inspection while booking.

Home Inspection.question: Is it free?
Home Inspection.answer: Yes, currently it‚Äôs a free service.

Home Inspection.question: What happens during inspection?
Home Inspection.answer: Our experts check the car and provide a quote.

Booking an Appointment.question: How do I book a car test drive?
Booking an Appointment.answer: Go to the car listing and click on 'Book Test Drive'.

Booking an Appointment.question: Is test drive free?
Booking an Appointment.answer: Yes, we offer free test drives in selected cities.

Booking an Appointment.question: Can I cancel my test drive?
Booking an Appointment.answer: Yes, you can cancel or reschedule through your account.

Branch Visit.question: Can I visit without booking?
Branch Visit.answer: Yes, but booking is recommended for faster service.

Branch Visit.question: What are your branch timings?
Branch Visit.answer: We‚Äôre open 10AM‚Äì7PM on all working days.

Branch Visit.question: Do branches have all cars?
Branch Visit.answer: Only select inventory is available. Confirm before visiting.

CARS24 Best Price.question: Is price negotiable?
CARS24 Best Price.answer: We offer competitive pricing, but deals are non-negotiable.

CARS24 Best Price.question: Do I get discounts?
CARS24 Best Price.answer: Yes, seasonal and coupon-based offers are available.

CARS24 Best Price.question: Can I see price history?
CARS24 Best Price.answer: Yes, pricing transparency is available on listings.

CARS24 Seller Protection Policy.question: Is buyer protected?
CARS24 Seller Protection Policy.answer: Yes, with warranties and return windows.

CARS24 Seller Protection Policy.question: What if the car has issues?
CARS24 Seller Protection Policy.answer: Return or claim support is available within warranty.

CARS24 Seller Protection Policy.question: Does it cover refund?
CARS24 Seller Protection Policy.answer: Yes, for eligible vehicles under buyer protection.

Post-Sales Service.question: What is the return policy?
Post-Sales Service.answer: Cars can be returned within 7 days if eligible.

Post-Sales Service.question: How do I claim warranty?
Post-Sales Service.answer: Via the app or customer support within coverage terms.

Transaction Guidelines.question: What is the payment method?
Transaction Guidelines.answer: Online payments, loan EMI, or UPI.

Transaction Guidelines.question: Is there a finance option?
Transaction Guidelines.answer: Yes, via partner NBFCs with flexible EMIs.

Transaction Guidelines.question: Can I use my credit card?
Transaction Guidelines.answer: Yes, subject to amount limits and transaction fees.

Pricing and Documentation.question: Do I get all documents?
Pricing and Documentation.answer: Yes, including RC, insurance and service history.

Pricing and Documentation.question: How is tax handled?
Pricing and Documentation.answer: RTO taxes are included in the final price shown.

Pricing and Documentation.question: Is invoice provided?
Pricing and Documentation.answer: Yes, digital and printed invoice both available.

Home Inspection.question: Can I inspect the car at home?
Home Inspection.answer: Not available. Cars are inspected before listing.

Home Inspection.question: How to trust the condition?
Home Inspection.answer: Cars are inspected and certified before sale.

Home Inspection.question: Are photos real?
Home Inspection.answer: Yes, taken during physical inspection by our experts.
